examples.example: 我爱他，这份爱让我的生活充满了甜蜜与温暖。

translate.english: I love him, and this love fills my life with sweetness and warmth.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么困难，我爱他的心都不会改变。

translate.english: No matter what difficulties are encountered, my heart that loves him will not change.

examples.example: 我爱他，并且会一直陪伴他走过人生的每一个阶段。

translate.english: I love him and will always accompany him through every stage of his life.
